specialData.description: A compact pouch for organizing small items.

specialData.description: An enormous bag that significantly increases your carrying capacity.

specialData.description: A large chest perfect for storing valuables. Too heavy to carry comfortably while full.

specialData.description: A reliable companion for any adventurer, with room for essentials.

notes.weight: Weight in pounds. The container's weight is separate from its contents.
notes.capacity: Maximum weight of items that can be stored inside (in pounds).
notes.capacityBonus: If the container is equipped, this bonus is added to the player's total carrying capacity.
notes.contents: Runtime property - not defined in template. Each instance stores its contents array.
notes.equipped: Runtime property - containers can be 'equipped' to provide carrying capacity bonuses.
